name: Jordan Gibbs
text: I always receive the best service! I love the staff and they're always so helpful! I love pizza and the hut does it right. Looking forward to the future of the chain at its new location on University.

name: Alexandra Slycord
text:
Pizza hut is by far the best place I will ever order from.
They always give you your special orders even if they discontinued it you just have to call. …More

name: Heidi Duttlinger
text: I had ordered a simple order, 8 boneless wings with honey bbq. I ordered it 45 minutes early and properly did the 'future time' feature on the website. I walk in and 4 or 5 employees proceed to see me and walk away, not greeting me or …More

name: Kelton Gourley
text: Great place. Great employees. Really helped us out with the half off deal when it wasn't working online. 10/10 Would recommend.

name: Nicholas Bailey
text: I think Pizza Hut is the best of the chains. Prices are the best for the quality of the food.

name: Steve Reed
text: Pretty much a typical Pizza Hut these days...
